title: source code missing package org.apache.lucene.search.highlight
description:
In attempting to find the source code for the package org.apache.lucene.search.highlight, it appears to be missing.  The expected folder for this had:
lucene-2.2.0->src->java->org->apache->lucene->search->function
lucene-2.2.0->src->java->org->apache->lucene->search->payload
lucene-2.2.0->src->java->org->apache->lucene->search->spans

but not:
lucene-2.2.0->src->java->org->apache->lucene->search->highlight

Am I looking in the wrong place or is this missing?

comments.content:
Please ask user questions on the mailinglist java-user@lucene.apache.org. JIRA is a bug and issue tracking system.

The highlighter is a contrib module, so you can find the packages in the folder contrib/highlighter.
comments.author: Michael Busch
